# SEQ16 Instructions

## Description
Sequence 16 focuses on the overall arrangement of a group of buildings

## Category
Buildings

## Patterns
apl095, apl096, apl097, apl098, apl099, apl100, apl101, apl102, apl103

## Emergent Phenomena
Building groups that create coherent outdoor spaces and support community interaction

## Overview
This sequence contains 9 pattern(s) that work together to create the emergent phenomena described above.
